name: Aculab
overview:
Aculab provides world class IP and media processing boards and software to the global communications market. We are an innovative, market leading company that places product quality and support right at the top of our agenda. With many years of experience in helping to drive our customers’ success, our enabling technology provides the essential components required to deliver multimodal voice, data, fax and video solutions for use within IP, PSTN and mobile networks - with performance levels that are second to none.

Aculab serves the evolving needs of developers, integrators, service providers and equipment manufacturers with cost-effective, deployment proven, high performance products. Companies worldwide have adopted our technology for a wide variety of business critical services and solutions. These can range from high performance inbound/outbound contact centre applications to speech enabled VoiceXML, IVR and self-service systems via fax and voice broadcast, conferencing, unified communications, messaging, prepaid, and other hosted services.

It is Aculab’s commitment to exemplary product capabilities, support and responding to customers’ needs that sets us apart. A proven partner of choice for companies in over 80 countries worldwide, Aculab’s media processing technology is delivering the invisible advantage in many converged communications solutions deployed globally today.
